full_summary:
### EJ196-240484 - HVAC Maintenance Canadian Embassy Haiti

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Bid Closing Date**: March 27, 2024, 14:00 EST

**Contract Duration**: August 1, 2024, to September 30, 2025

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category**: SRV

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Solicitation Details**:
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: Haiti
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Jessica Wang (SPAC/PSPC), jessica.wang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bidder Requirements**:
- **Virtual Microsoft Teams Call**: Mandatory attendance on March 7, 2024, at 9:00 am EST
- **Bidding and Contract Security Requirements**: Specified in the Statement of Work
- **Bid Submissions**: Required documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 27, 2024, at 14:00 EST; bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive

**Tender Description**:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for HVAC maintenance services to support the Canadian Embassy in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. The contract will involve providing necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labor for equipment maintenance according to the Statement of Work. Security requirements and a mandatory Microsoft Teams virtual call will be essential to the evaluation process.
